about_the_game:
Included in the demo:

Game mode: Campaign
Mission: Trailblazer
Boss: Monarch
Champion: Sentinel
Enemy types: Swarmer, Driller, Digger, Protector, Exploder, Energizer, Oiler, Collector, Charged Collector
Equipment: 12 Weapons, 12 Modifiers.
Upgrades: Strictly limited
Quests: Turret, Flamer, Drill, Shielder, Hive
Loadout: Gun, Empyrean Sledge, Soldier

About HiveCorp

Become an unstoppable force and survive endless waves of enemies in this unforgiving action rogue-lite auto-shooter.
Unlock new equipment and upgrade your stats to keep pushing the limit of how long you can survive.

About Counterspell studios

Counterspell Studios is a small two-man indie studio based in Stockholm, Sweden. We love playing games as much as we love making them.

We're now on a mission to build up our own indie studio and figured that the best way in doing so, is from the ground up. That's how we got started on making our very first game HiveCorp!

HiveCorp has been developed on our spare time during 2022-2023. We hope you will love it as much as we loved making it!

If you do like it, you can wishlist it on Steam or send us a donation here on itch. We need every bit of help we can get to reach out and continue making games! And hopefully one day in the future do this full-time.

  • OS *: Windows 7 or newer, 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-8250U CPU @ 1.60GHz 1.80 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce MX150, 2GB VRAM

pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or newer, 64-bit
  • Processor: INTEL. AMD 4 cores CPU at 3Ghz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM

short_description: Join the HiveCorp mercenaries in their fight against an onslaught of enemies in this action rogue-lite auto-shooter. Avoid enemies, level up and combine powerful weapons and equipment to survive.
